mapper.select: select * from member where memberId = '${memberId}' and memberPw = '${memberPw}'
mapper.insert: insert into member (memberId, memberPw, memberEmail) values ('${memberId}', '${memberPw}', '${memberEmail}')
mapper.update: update member set memberPw = '${memberPw}', memberEmail = '${memberEmail}' where memberId = '${memberId}'
mapper.delete: delete from member where memberId = '${memberId}' and memberPw = '${memberPw}' and memberEmail = '${memberEmail}'
